Write-Up Text: The people of Australia are buzzing about the upcoming federal budget with many hoping it will deliver relief for those struggling with the cost of living. Multiple posts highlight the budget's predicted measures including $14.6 billion of cost-of-living relief increases in single parent support and the ditching of controversial parenting policies. However some criticize the proposed Stage 3 tax cuts as worsening the economic divide in the country. Amidst all the predictions experts stress the importance of small targets to achieve big gains and ease the ongoing financial crisis.
